name: Pixel Alchemy
description:
The world has been destroyed, all that is left is the 4 base elements: Water, Fire, Air and Earth. Combine them to re-build the world.

Controls:

  • Arrows: move cursor
  • X: "Click" the cursor, grab elements to move them around
  • Z: Toggle between the menu and game space. Move to an element with the arrow keys and press X to spawn it in the world

Made using the TIC-80 for the Fantasy Console Game Jam #1.
